 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָגַהּ‎</span> **verb** ==shine== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nagû***</u></abbr>, ***shine***, ***beam***, ***be joyful***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 446</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Late Hebrew [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺגְהָא‎</span> planet ***Venus***) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ועלדֿרכיך נ‎</span> [[Job.22.28|Job 22:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עליהם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אור נ‎</span> [[Isa.9.1|Isa 9:1]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ולאיִֿגַּהּ שְׁבִיב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשּׁוֺ‎</span> [[Job.18.5|Job 18:5]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 

**1.** ***enlighten*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויהוה יַגִּיהַּ חָשְׁכִּי‎</span> [[2Sam.22.29|2Sam 22:29]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יהוה אלהי יַגִּהַּ הּשׁכי‎</span> [[Ps.18.29|Ps 18:29]]. 

**2.** ***cause to shine*** (of moon) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָרֵחַ לאֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַגִּיהַּ אוֺרוֺ׃‎</span> [[Isa.13.10|Isa 13:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָשַׁך‎</span>).
